test_cases.initial_prompt: I want to do heavy computations on my data, possibly something like the usual pandas dataframes but more performant.
I want to create a sankey diagram for my monthly income and expenses.
I have an Excel sheet with messy customer names. I want to read it, fix the capitalization, and save it as a CSV file.
I want to create interactive visualizations of some company-internal data.
I want to visualize voting results of a national vote on a map of Austria.
I'd like to build a CLI tool to calculate roots of polynomials.
I want to process some SVG images consisting of simple polygons.
I want to use some graph-drawing algorithms to visualize networks.
I want to fine tune an open weights model for autocompletion in my writing style.
I want to create an interactive web dashboard that lets users explore and filter a dataset without me having to write a lot of frontend code
I want to create a semantic search engine that finds the most similar documents using vector embeddings.
I want to automatically tune hyperparameters of a neural network to maximize validation accuracy.
Build a geospatial indexing system that aggregates ride-sharing demand into hexagonal grid cells.
I want to analyze large parquet datasets locally by running fast SQL queries directly on files without a database server.
I'd like to use my Nvidia GPU to crunch some numbers (linear algebra).
